hh3cMplsOam.name: hh3cMplsOam
hh3cMplsOam.contactinfo: Platform Team Hangzhou H3C Tech. Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
hh3cMplsOam.description: This MIB contains objects to configure OAM module. The Operation, Administration and Maintenance (OAM) is an effective means for decreasing the cost of network maintenance. The MPLS OAM is used to administrate and maintain MPLS.

Hh3cMplsOAMDefectType.name: Hh3cMplsOAMDefectType
Hh3cMplsOAMDefectType.description: An indication of the OAM's defect type: 1: dServer, server layer defect; 2: dPeerMe, peer network maintenance entity defect; 3: dLOCV, Loss of Connectivity Verification defect; 4: dTTSIMismatch, Trail Termination Source Identifier Mismatch defect; 5: dTTSIMismerge, Trail Termination Source Identifier Mismerge defect; 6: dExcess, receiving excess rate of CV/FFD; 7: dUnknown, unknown defect in the MPLS network.. 8: rlsn down; 9: dLspDown; 10: MPLS OAM ME; 11: no defect.

Hh3cMplsOAMDetectFreq.name: Hh3cMplsOAMDetectFreq
Hh3cMplsOAMDetectFreq.description: An indication of the OAM's frequent type( ITU-T: Y.1711(0402) ): For CV: the frequency is static. The value is 1/s. For FFD: the frequency is set by user. The value can be 10ms, 20ms, 50ms, 100ms, 200ms, 500ms. Any other frequency is wrong. 1: 10ms; 2: 20ms; 3: 50ms; 4: 100ms; 5: 200ms; 6: 500ms; 7: 1000ms(only for cv).

hh3cMplsOamCapability.name: hh3cMplsOamCapability
hh3cMplsOamCapability.description: Whether OAM is globally capable. false: incapable; true: capable; The default value is incapable.

hh3cMplsOamTrapOpen.name: hh3cMplsOamTrapOpen
hh3cMplsOamTrapOpen.description: Whether OAM trap is globally enabled. false: disable; true: enable; The default value is disable.

hh3cMplsOamIgrTable.name: hh3cMplsOamIgrTable
hh3cMplsOamIgrTable.description: This table specifies per-LSP MPLS OAM ingress capability and associated information, such as IgrLspName and IgrDetType.

hh3cMplsOamIgrEntry.name: hh3cMplsOamIgrEntry
hh3cMplsOamIgrEntry.description: An entry in this table is created by an LSR for every LSP capable of supporting MPLS OAM at ingress.

hh3cMplsOamIgrIndex.name: hh3cMplsOamIgrIndex
hh3cMplsOamIgrIndex.description: This is an unique index for an OAM ingress entry in the OAM table.

hh3cMplsOamIgrLspName.name: hh3cMplsOamIgrLspName
hh3cMplsOamIgrLspName.description: The name of an LSP. It means the LSP name of the detected LSP.

hh3cMplsOamIgrDetectType.name: hh3cMplsOamIgrDetectType
hh3cMplsOamIgrDetectType.description: There are two types of OAM packets, CV and FFD. The CV flow is generated at the source LSR of the LSP with a nominal frequency of 1/s and terminated at the sink LSR of the LSP. FFD provides failure detection option for an LSP independent of the CV based availability model and is not tied to the CV insertion rate. Insertion rates at 1/s or faster may also be used. The CV/FFD packet contains a network-unique identifier (TTSI) so that all types of defects can be detected. 1: CV; 2: FFD.

hh3cMplsOamIgrDetectFreq.name: hh3cMplsOamIgrDetectFreq
hh3cMplsOamIgrDetectFreq.description: Indication of the OAM's frequent type.

hh3cMplsOamIgrRevType.name: hh3cMplsOamIgrRevType
hh3cMplsOamIgrRevType.description: When an LSP is found to be in defect, the sink LSR of the LSP should send BDI to inform the source LSR of the LSP, the BDI is transferred through the reverse LSP. The type of reverse LSP can be private or shared. If private, then the reverse LSP can be used only by the oam ingress; If shared, the reverse LSP which is shared between many forward LSPs, whose source LSRs are the same and sink LSRs are the same. 1: private; 2: share.

hh3cMplsOamIgrRevLspName.name: hh3cMplsOamIgrRevLspName
hh3cMplsOamIgrRevLspName.description: The object indicates the name of the reverse LSP.

hh3cMplsOamIgrLspId.name: hh3cMplsOamIgrLspId
hh3cMplsOamIgrLspId.description: For ingress, the object indicates the lsp ID of the detected LSP.

hh3cMplsOamIgrEnable.name: hh3cMplsOamIgrEnable
hh3cMplsOamIgrEnable.description: Whether one LSP is OAM enable. If disable, LSP is not monitored; If enable, CV/FFD is generated at the source LSR of the LSP and checked at the sink LSR of the LSP, and user can set other configuration. false: The OAM function is disabled on the ingress; true: The OAM function is enabled on the ingress.

hh3cMplsOamIgrDefectType.name: hh3cMplsOamIgrDefectType
hh3cMplsOamIgrDefectType.description: Indication of the OAM's defect type.

hh3cMplsOamIgrRowStatus.name: hh3cMplsOamIgrRowStatus
hh3cMplsOamIgrRowStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing the creation, deletion and modification of rows, which support active status and CreatAndGo, destroy operation. To create a new row, hh3cMplsOamIgrLspName, hh3cMplsOamIgrDetectType, hh3cMplsOamIgrDetectFreq, hh3cMplsOamIgrRevType, hh3cMplsOamIgrRevLspName, and hh3cMplsOamIgrLspId must be specified.

hh3cMplsOamEgrTable.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrTable
hh3cMplsOamEgrTable.description: This table specifies per-LSP MPLS OAM capability and associated information, such as DetectType, DetectFrequency.

hh3cMplsOamEgrEntry.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrEntry
hh3cMplsOamEgrEntry.description: An entry in this table is created by an LSR for every LSP capable of supporting MPLS OAM at egress.

hh3cMplsOamEgrIndex.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrIndex
hh3cMplsOamEgrIndex.description: This is a unique index for an OAM egress entry in the OAM table.

hh3cMplsOamEgrLspName.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrLspName
hh3cMplsOamEgrLspName.description: The object indicates the name of static LSP at egress.

hh3cMplsOamEgrDetectType.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrDetectType
hh3cMplsOamEgrDetectType.description: There are two types of OAM packets, CV and FFD. The CV flow is generated at the source LSR of the LSP with a nominal frequency of 1/s and terminated at the sink LSR of the LSP. FFD provides failure detection option for an LSP independent of the CV based availability model and is not tied to the CV insertion rate. Insertion rates at 1/s or faster may also be used. The CV/FFD packet contains a network-unique identifier (TTSI) so that all types of defects can be detected. 1: CV; 2: FFD.

hh3cMplsOamEgrDetectFreq.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrDetectFreq
hh3cMplsOamEgrDetectFreq.description: Indication of the OAM's frequent type.

hh3cMplsOamEgrRevType.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrRevType
hh3cMplsOamEgrRevType.description: When an LSP is found to be in defect, the sink LSR of the LSP should send BDI to inform the source LSR of the LSP, the BDI is transferred through the reverse LSP. The type of reverse LSP can be private or shared. If private, then the reverse LSP can be used only when the only LSP in defect; If shared, the reverse LSP, which is shared between many forward LSPs that have the same source LSRs and sink LSRs. 1: private; 2: share.

hh3cMplsOamEgrRevLspName.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrRevLspName
hh3cMplsOamEgrRevLspName.description: The object indicates the name of a reverse static-lsp.

hh3cMplsOamEgrLsrId.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrLsrId
hh3cMplsOamEgrLsrId.description: The object indicates the Ingress LSR ID of the LSP.

hh3cMplsOamEgrLspId.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrLspId
hh3cMplsOamEgrLspId.description: The object indicates the the Ingress session lsp ID of the detected static-LSP.

hh3cMplsOamEgrEnable.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrEnable
hh3cMplsOamEgrEnable.description: Whether one LSP is enabled with OAM. If disable, LSP is not monitored; If enable, CV/FFD is generated at the source LSR of the LSP and checked at the sink LSR of the LSP, and user can set other configuration. false: The OAM function is disabled on the egress; true: The OAM function is enabled on the egress.

hh3cMplsOamEgrDefectType.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrDefectType
hh3cMplsOamEgrDefectType.description: Indication of the OAM's defect type.

hh3cMplsOamEgrRowStatus.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrRowStatus
hh3cMplsOamEgrRowStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing the creation, deletion and modification of rows, which support active status and CreatAndGo, destroy operation. To create a new row, hh3cMplsOamEgrLspName, hh3cMplsOamEgrDetectType, hh3cMplsOamEgrDetectFreq, hh3cMplsOamEgrRevType, hh3cMplsOamEgrRevLspName, hh3cMplsOamEgrLsrId and hh3cMplsOamEgrLspId must be specified.

hh3cMplsOamIgrLSPOutDefect.name: hh3cMplsOamIgrLSPOutDefect
hh3cMplsOamIgrLSPOutDefect.description: This notification is generated when the LSP is found out of the defect state at the LSP ingress.

hh3cMplsOamIgrLSPInDefect.name: hh3cMplsOamIgrLSPInDefect
hh3cMplsOamIgrLSPInDefect.description: This notification is generated when the LSP is found in the defect state at the LSP ingress.

hh3cMplsOamEgrLSPOutDefect.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrLSPOutDefect
hh3cMplsOamEgrLSPOutDefect.description: This notification is generated when the LSP is found out of the defect state at the LSP egress.

hh3cMplsOamEgrLSPInDefect.name: hh3cMplsOamEgrLSPInDefect
hh3cMplsOamEgrLSPInDefect.description: This notification is generated when the LSP is found in the defect state at the LSP egress.
